In Narathiwat , Corporal Somsak Yuklai , 30 , sustained serious head injuries following a bomb attack on rangers guarding teachers in tambon Srisakorn about 8.40 am .
An hour later , another bomb exploded near Rangae district office in tambon Ba - ngosato , injuring the three defence volunteers .
